h1_title: The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm
img_above_text:
# The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm
## Lower Pagoda (Level 2)

Not far after them, you'll encounter an Enslaved Yaksha. You can think of him as the Frozen Corpse in his prime, as he uses a similar very long sword, and can sweep in wide arcs with it, or thrust forward with a huge amount of reach. Luckily, his attacks are all very slow, and easily baited into a Rock Solid deflection.

img_summary:
### Summary of the Image:

The image depicts a dark, rocky corridor within the Lower Pagoda (Level 2) of the Pagoda Realm. A player character, armed with a staff-like weapon, is approaching a glowing red enemy, likely the "Enslaved Yaksha" mentioned in the preceding text. The environment is dimly lit, with torches providing sparse illumination. The game's interface is visible, showing health, stamina, and ability icons, suggesting active gameplay. This scene aligns with the narrative of encountering and preparing to engage a slow yet dangerous foe in this level of the pagoda.
